mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( GRADE, CREATED_DATE, ID, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, EMAIL ) VALUES('U', now(), #{id}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email} )
INSERT INTO member_info(num, age, type, gender, region_num) VALUES(#{num}, #{age}, #{type}, #{gender}, #{region_num})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT num from member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT count(num) FROM member_info WHERE num = (SELECT num FROM member WHERE id = #{id})
SELECT * FROM location WHERE region LIKE CONCAT(#{province}, '%')
